value:
Only when I have delivered the last of
these gifts will my duty be fulfilled.

With armor blessed by the goddess,
I am better suited to observing a holy
night than most.

Alondite can rest for one night. I have
chosen a different implement for
this occasion.

I will have no trouble getting to the
recipients of these gifts quickly
and covertly.

So I am to enter the house through...
the chimney? Why?

No need to be tense. I have merely
come to deliver a gift to you from
your friend $Nf.

No one shall disturb the festivities.
You have my word.

The fight is over. Take this gift as
consolation and return home.
It would seem I have scared them off.

As thanks for this, I shall redouble my
efforts to make the festival a success.

I will do and say only what is strictly
necessary to ensure the success of
this festival.

This festival has afforded me a rare
opportunity to reflect upon what it
means to be a knight.$k$pTo cross swords with worthy foes in
order to become stronger is one
aspect of knighthood. But only one.$k$pA knight must also serve a liege, so
that the nation may remain stable
and safeguard its people.$k$pIt follows from this that a knight must
also have a relationship with his
liege's subjects.$k$pWith that in mind, if there is anything
I might wish for, it would be... No.
Now is not the time.$k$pFor the moment, I will devote myself
fully to protecting the peace.
The winter festival is upon us.
For the holiday.
The night is still.
Are you the praying type?
Dark yields to dawn...
I will carry out the orders given to me by my lord. Whatever they may be.
It would seem that a gift for you is not among the ones I have here.
I had hoped this appearance would help me to blend in. Not to be accosted continually by children.
This festival is utterly foreign to me.
Peace, however temporary, ought to be cherished.
My wishes...are my own.
May your night be peaceful.
Ready.
At once.
Command me.
